title: Person of Interest - Carl Elias Meets Harold Finch S04E04
author: The Joker
comment: Elias is the top 3 character in the show.
description:
Person Of Interest S04E04 
Elias started realising that there is an existence of a new enemy/player (which is samaritan). He did not need to know who samaritan was but throughout he's research studying the world, he saw that something Fundamental (huge) has changed… (Theft, Drugs, Bank Robbery… All were being grabbed by samaritan all around the world without people being able to trace whats going on) (Something Has Changed! Something Fundamental!) 

Elias is Very smart!… All he knew was something has Changed and out of all the people he was the first one to work it out… He was not as smart as samaritan but it makes me wonder who would win a chess match between him and Harold lol
